content.heading: C++ Booleans
paragraphs: Very often, in programming, you will need a data type that can only have one of two values, like:

YES / NO
  ON / OFF
  TRUE / FALSE

For this, C++ has a bool data type, which can take the values true 
(1) or false (0).
